mapper.insert: insert into go_comment(cmt_id, cmt_board, cmt_content, cmt_writer) values(seq_comment.nextval, #{cmt_board}, #{cmt_content}, #{cmt_writer})
mapper.update: update go_comment set cmt_content = #{cmt_content}, cmt_updateDate = sysdate where cmt_id = #{cmt_id}
mapper.select: select count(cmt_id) from go_comment where cmt_board = #{cmt_board}
